text: SolarFlix (formerly ETC) is a Philippine free-to-air television network owned by the Southern Broadcasting Network subsidiary of Solar Entertainment Corporation. ==SolarFlix Stations Nationwide== ===Digital=== Branding Callsign Ch. # Frequency Power Area of Coverage Solar Flix Manila DWCP-DTV 21 515.143 MHz 3 kW Metro Manila Solar Flix Legazpi DWSN-DTV 3 kW Legazpi, Albay Solar Flix Iloilo DYCX-DTV 3 kW Iloilo Solar Flix Bacolod DYLP-DTV 3 kW Bacolod Solar Flix Cebu DYCP-DTV 3 kW Cebu Solar Flix Tacloban DYSA-DTV 3 kW Tacloban Solar Flix Zamboanga DXSA-DTV 3 kW Zamboanga Solar Flix Davao DXSS-DTV 3 kW Davao ===Planned/Upcoming Stations=== ===Digital=== Branding Callsign Ch. # Frequency Power Area of Coverage Solar Flix Laoag rowspan="6" 21 515.143 MHz 3 kW Laoag, Ilocos Norte Solar Flix Tuguegarao 3 kW Tuguegarao Solar Flix Baguio 3 kW Baguio Solar Flix Naga 3 kW Naga, Camarines Sur Solar Flix Cagayan de Oro 3 kW Cagayan de Oro Solar Flix General Santos 3 kW General Santos Category:Philippine television networks
title: SolarFlix
